name: gestor-proyectos
description: Aplicación web completa para gestión de proyectos personales

scripts.build:render: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:server && npm run lint:fix:client
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules server/node_modules client/node_modules server/dist client/dist
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build

author: David Rey <bazamus@github.com>
